document_data.name: Aggy
document_data.mainbody:
Sharp-eye '''Aggy''' was a raider and [[Cult of the Absolute|cultist of the Absolute]] who served at the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|We looted an entire inn - brought back enough booze to drown a [[dragon]].|Aggy.}}
document_data.Description: Aggy had green skin upon which he slathered blue war paint. He dressed in simple cloth and leather clothes, along with a small scrap metal breastplate.
document_data.Possessions: He carried within him a crude wooden [[bow]].
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Aggy and other cultist raiders launch a full on assault against the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn. They stole loads of riches, food, and alcohol from the establishment and set it ablaze after they left.

Back at the Shattered Sanctum, the goblins and their allies held a great party to celebrate their victory.
